item.title: From Science Fiction to Reality: The Evolution of Artificial Intelligence
item.description:
From Science Fiction to Reality: The Evolution of Artificial Intelligence

What was once just a figment of the imagination of some our most famous science fiction writers, artificial intelligence (AI) is taking root in our everyday lives. We're still a few years away from having robots at our beck and call, but AI has already had a profound impact in more subtle ways.

item.title: Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set
item.description:
Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set

At a conference on productivity-which touched on everything from the importance of tech-free alone time to the educational and emotional benefits of writing by hand (as outlined in a series of studies on the subject)- Moleskine unveiled their latest analog-to-digital wonder.

item.title: A Guide To Great Coffee In Kichijoji, Tokyo - Sprudge
item.description:
A Guide To Great Coffee In Kichijoji, Tokyo - Sprudge

Spring in Japan is marked by the cherry blossom, when pink clouds of the blooming flower paint on a canvas of clear blue sky. It's a time to celebrate the beautiful transience of life, which the locals often do at picnics in the park-known as -under a gentle rain of falling petals.

item.title: OneCook Personal Robotic Chef
item.description:
OneCook Personal Robotic Chef

Modern kitchen appliances can brew you the perfect espresso, bake a fluffy loaf of bread, mix a killer cocktail or even blend up a personalized smoothie-all with the press of a single button. So why not program them to cook a full meal? That's exactly what Boston-based company TNL Corp.

item.title: The First-Ever 360-Degree Video Surgery Is Happening On Thursday
item.description:
The First-Ever 360-Degree Video Surgery Is Happening On Thursday

Over the course of two hours or so on Thursday, Dr. Shafi Ahmed will perform a more-or-less routine surgery on a man in his seventies with colon cancer. The 47-year-old cancer specialist will make a small slice on the patient's belly, remove the tumor from his bowel, and stitch the tissue back together.

item.title: Paint With Fire Using This Virtual Reality App
item.description:

Vocativ uses intelligent technology, smart journalists and the wisdom of the crowd to find story leads and angles no other news organization can.

item.title: Remembering Prince: What The Purple One Can Teach You About Creativity
item.description:
Remembering Prince: What The Purple One Can Teach You About Creativity

Join Entrepreneur and today's most influential business innovators in Denver, May 4. Register Now " Prince, a pioneering musician and creative, died today at 57. This game-changing artist merged his special take on funk and rock into 39 albums, creating classics such as Purple Rain and Little Red Corvette.
